body_html: @wangg12 I have a simple workaround to fix this. It is probably some memory related issue. Get gfxcardstatus and force switch to integrated and then switch back to Discrete only. It kinda resets the graphics card. Check the GPU memory with cuda-smi. This process frees up GPU memory. Run your code again. Should work. I assume you are using macOS.

body: @wangg12 I have a simple workaround to fix this. It is probably some memory related issue. Get gfxcardstatus and force switch to integrated and then switch back to Discrete only. It kinda resets the graphics card. Check the GPU memory with cuda-smi. This process frees up GPU memory. Run your code again. Should work. I assume  you are using macOS.
